author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming Summer 2026: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ivstudios/realm-of-reckoning

Realm of Reckoning throws you into a shattered afterlife where five rival factions fight to reshape what power even means. Each turn you’ll draft action cards, collect artifacts, and trigger reckonings. Big clashes that drain resources but let winners rewrite the victory conditions. Build monuments, reclaim relics, and twist the rules in your favor as the ages unfold.

It’s part area control, part engine building, and part “make the rules up as you go.” Across three ages, every choice nudges how the afterlife will be scored, so your path to victory is never the same twice. At the end of the third age, one faction claims dominance, and everyone else fades into ghostly obscurity.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Realm of Reckoning Preview -  Rule the Afterlife or Fade Away 👑 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
On BackerKit Now: https://project-l-universe.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders

Project L is that effortlessly cool friend—easy to teach, easy to love. Perfect for game night with literally anyone. But THEN Square One shows up… and it’s giving post-breakup glow-up. Same puzzle vibes, but a whole new level of satisfying.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Square One (vs Project L) Preview - My Shelf Just Got Hotter 🔥🧩 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming Fall 2025: https://bit.ly/4jeCg8d

General Orders: Sengoku Jidai takes the tight, cutthroat worker-placement system of General Orders: WWII and drops it into 16th-century Japan. Two daimyo square off, deploying commanders to seize forts, choke supply lines, and unleash siege weapons across two battle maps. With ships, waterways, and brutal new tactics in play, it’s a compact 2-player showdown that mixes wargame tension with sharp, brain-burny decision-making.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: General Orders: Sengoku Jidai Preview - Little Box, Big Strategy (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming November 2025: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chriscouch/holiday-hills

Get ready to race against the clock in Holiday Hills, where you’ll team up with a human and an elf to decorate Jingle Bell Square for the Winter Festival! 🛷🎁 Collect dice presents, fill up your tree with festive decorations, and deliver joy to the town in this delightful holiday puzzle game! But hurry – there’s only ONE lap around the town before the snow falls! ❄️🎄 Will you be the first to complete your tree and earn the Key to the City? Or will your opponents steal the spotlight with their dazzling display of holiday cheer? 🎉 Find out in this perky, fast-paced holiday adventure!

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Holiday Hills Preview - Decorate, Race, and Spread Cheer! ✨🎄 (Board Games Direct)
